issue.title: [CF 739] Affliction question
issue.body:
hi, i was wondering if it is possible or will it be possible in a future release to track the last dot applied, as a affliction warlock one of our passive is pandemic "the duration remaining on the previous effect is added to the new one up to a maximum of 50% the base duration".

so if Bane of Agony is reaply at 10sec remaining the total duration of the dot will be 30sec but at this point i could refresh the dot at 20second instead of 10 but i can't find how to show me that number


> Posted by CurseForge user frofrog | Imported from CurseForge issue #739 | Raw

comments.body:
No, this is not a planned feature.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
